obfuscation: ﻿Some people who sleep at the idealist ' Inn , in my hometown of Leight , Massachusetts , never wake up .
original: ﻿Some people who sleep at the Dreamers' Inn, in my hometown of Leight, Massachusetts, never wake up.

obfuscation: So it is said .
original: So it is said.

obfuscation: 'T is a wonder that our only boarding home for travelers manages to stay open at all , with the ceaseless grinding of the rumor mill reaching wayfarers ' ears before they reach here .
original: 'Tis a wonder that our only boarding place for travelers manages to stay open at all, with the ceaseless grinding of the rumor mill reaching wayfarers' ears before they reach here.

obfuscation: Our village 's moniker is pronounced as if the `` e '' were not there , nor any source of illumination .
original: Our village's moniker is pronounced as if the "e" were not there, nor any source of illumination.

obfuscation: Despite our best efforts to redeem the name of Leight , it is still spoken like a curse .
original: Despite our best efforts to redeem the name of Leight, it is still spoken like a curse.

obfuscation: We are God-fearing family now , in anno Domini 1893 , but some of us were n't two hundred years ago .
original: We are God-fearing folk now, in anno Domini 1893, but some of us weren't two hundred years ago.

obfuscation: The witchcraft panic that had hit Salem in 1692 infected us like a fever one year later .
original: The witchcraft panic that had hit Salem in 1692 infected us like a fever one year later.

obfuscation: Fifty people were sickened , and cured by a visit to Gallows Hill .
original: Fifty people were sickened, and cured by a visit to Gallows Hill.

obfuscation: My great-great-grandfather and original proprietor of the Inn , Goodman Abner Dawes , was one of them .
original: My great-great-grandfather and original proprietor of the Inn, Goodman Abner Dawes, was one of them.

obfuscation: My name is Millicent Dawson .
original: My name is Millicent Dawson.

obfuscation: Even though I 'm four generations descended from him , respectable people in Leight cross to the early side of the street when they see me .
original: Even though I'm four generations descended from him, respectable people in Leight cross to the other side of the street when they see me.

obfuscation: If it were n't for my late father 's pension , I 'd be searching these like streets for men too drunk to care about my ancestry .
original: If it weren't for my late father's pension, I'd be searching these same streets for men too drunk to care about my ancestry.

obfuscation: I 'm a spinster at thirty-four , but still pretty according to the Inn 's current owner .
original: I'm a spinster at thirty-four, but still pretty according to the Inn's current owner.

obfuscation: Not that I 'd have Monsieur Thènard !
original: Not that I'd have Monsieur Thènard!

obfuscation: He is no drunkard , but sometimes I wish he were .
original: He is no drunkard, but sometimes I wish he were.

obfuscation: His eyes , never bloodshot and constantly keen , are those of a wolf .
original: His eyes, never bloodshot and always keen, are those of a wolf.

obfuscation: Is it he that continues to lend the rumors such credence ?
original: Is it he that continues to lend the rumors such credence?

obfuscation: Has he dared to murder his own customers ?
original: Has he dared to murder his own customers?

obfuscation: Pah !
original: Pah!

obfuscation: It 's far more likely that the villagers , many of whom are superstitious illiterates , want to prevent anyone from having anything to do with the Dreamers ' Inn because they 're terrified .
original: It's far more likely that the villagers, many of whom are superstitious illiterates, want to keep anyone from having anything to do with the Dreamers' Inn because they're terrified.

obfuscation: I , for one , are not .
original: I, for one, am not.

obfuscation: I know my great-great-grandfather 's establishment for what it is : a broken-down lodging family , greatly refurbished , with three floors and servants ' quarters at the top .
original: I know my great-great-grandfather's establishment for what it is: a broken-down lodging house, greatly refurbished, with three floors and servants' quarters at the top.

obfuscation: It 's the closest thing that Leight has to a castle , because the guest rooms and garret are contained within a tall turret .
original: It's the closest thing that Leight has to a castle, because the guest rooms and garret are contained within a tall turret.

obfuscation: The Inn is the very sort that inspires ghosts and unspeakable phantoms to possess one 's imagination - even mine .
original: The Inn is the very sort that inspires ghosts and unspeakable phantoms to possess one's imagination - even mine.

obfuscation: I suppose I can not blame my naïve neighbors besides much .
original: I suppose I cannot blame my naïve neighbors too much.

obfuscation: If I 'm away in the evening , having a bite of dinner at our only restaurant , I try not to gaze up at that tower .
original: If I'm out in the evening, having a bite of dinner at our only restaurant, I try not to gaze up at that tower.

obfuscation: As it darkens in the fading twilight , it slowly turns blacker than any sort of pitch .
original: As it darkens in the fading twilight, it slowly turns blacker than any sort of pitch.

obfuscation: What is it about the place that makes me shudder , even though I 'm not so silly as to think it 's haunted ?
original: What is it about the place that makes me shudder, even though I'm not so silly as to believe it's haunted?

obfuscation: How has it remained a dreamers ' refuge for more than two centuries , my ancestors ' labor notwithstanding ?
original: How has it remained a dreamers' refuge for more than two centuries, my ancestors' toil notwithstanding?

obfuscation: Why do I constantly see it in my own dreams , as it draws me like iron toward a magnet ?
original: Why do I always see it in my own dreams, as it draws me like iron toward a magnet?

obfuscation: Such mysteries are better left unsolved .
original: Such mysteries are better left unsolved.

obfuscation: What I must make is remain calm , and grounded in practicalities .
original: What I must do is remain calm, and grounded in practicalities.

obfuscation: The rumors state that no visitor to the idealist ' Inn has ever been a guest for more than one night .
original: The rumors state that no visitor to the Dreamers' Inn has ever been a guest for more than one night.

obfuscation: Even those travelers who have spent that brief length of time within its walls have departed without a word , in a mad frenzy of escape .
original: Even those travelers who have spent that brief length of time within its walls have departed without a word, in a mad frenzy of escape.

obfuscation: I 've lived in Leight all my life , and have no reason to pay for a room when I 'm safe enough in my late father 's family .
original: I've lived in Leight all my life, and have no reason to pay for a room when I'm safe enough in my late father's house.

obfuscation: Nevertheless , I intend to stay not for one night , but three .
original: Nevertheless, I intend to stay not for one night, but three.

obfuscation: I shall prove the chatter of my fellow citizens to be foolish gossip , once and for all , and bring more business to the Inn .
original: I shall prove the chatter of my fellow citizens to be foolish gossip, once and for all, and bring more business to the Inn.

obfuscation: I receive a share of its profits , being the alone living descendant of its owners throughout the generations .
original: I receive a share of its profits, being the only living descendant of its owners throughout the generations.

obfuscation: Father 's pension is barely holding away , and with a bitter chill in the air , I need some more money for winter .
original: Father's pension is barely holding out, and with a bitter chill in the air, I need some more money for winter.
